Puppeteer !buildhttps://github.com/puppeteer/puppeteer/actions/workflows/ci.yml !npm puppeteer packagehttps://npmjs.org/package/puppeteer <img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10379601/29446482-04f7036a-841f-11e7-9872-91d1fc2ea683.png" height="200" align="right"/> > Puppeteer is a JavaScript library which provides a high-level API to control > Chrome or Firefox over the > DevTools Protocol or WebDriver BiDi. > Puppeteer runs in the headless no visible UI by default Get started | API | FAQ | Contributing | Troubleshooting Installation Example
